name: Nettspend
description:
'''Gunner Shepardson''' (born March 18, 2007), professionally known as '''Nettspend''', is an American rapper and songwriter. He gained popularity after a snippet of his song "Drankdrankdrank" went [[Viral video|viral]] on [[Twitter]] in late 2023.

Growing up surrounded by music, Nettspend began rapping while in fifth grade. After releasing multiple singles, Nettspend released his debut mixtape, ''[[Bad Ass F*cking Kid]]'', on December 6, 2024. 

Nettspend's musical style stems from [[Trap music|trap]] and [[Jerkin'|jerk]], which are subgenres of [[Hip-hop|hip hop]]. He commonly employs "[[Distortion (music)|distorted]] [[Roland TR-808|808s]]", "loose piano riffs", and "glimmering [[Synthesizer|synths]]" in his music, according to ''[[The Fader]]''. He is an affiliate of [[Xaviersobased]]'s collective 1c34, which popularized the jerk subgenre.
